channel.title: Safezones
channel.description: ok i wanna make a safezone but i dont know how to make the coords different for making the safezone? i have this atm [code]if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||[/code] but thats for making varock east bank and dummy room non wild..how do i get the coords? please help..

i know you’re supposed to enter the coords of the safe zone, i do believe the two x coords are the two opposit corners of the area you wanna make a safezone, and the same with the y, but i’m not 100% sure, if that helped at all :\ sorry if it didn’t just trying to maybe steer you in the right direction?
